name: Build, Don't Die!
description: I'm working on a new game called "Build, Don't Die!". I decided to make the game because I found a new game engine called Godot, seems to be pretty good for 2d games, so I wanted to try it out. It's going to be a sort of base building game with resource collection, and enemies coming in waves, thats all I'm sure about for now though. [WARNING: THIS CURRENT VERSION HAS NO CHALLENGES AND IS NOT FOR FUN, IT IS JUST A TEST BUILD.]
